full_threads.body:
Apologies, my mistake. I thought that you look after that also.

I will check with Michelle regarding changing the brochure.

If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Kindest regards,

Hana

celebrate with us at love.fish this holiday season

There's never been a better time to celebrate outdoor dining! Join us outside at our stunning waterfront location, whether it's a romantic dinner for two or for a group celebration. Let our team help create the perfect end of year event.

NYE

Celebrate New Year's Eve with us at love.fish as we count down to the New Year on the waterfront! Your New Years, Your Way. No set menu requirement, just a $90pp minimum spend on food and beverages from our full a la carte menu. Children under 12 have a $30 min spend, with a kids menu available.

Book online here.

Or for group reservations of 10 guests and more, please contact our team bookings@lovefish.com.au for more information.

7/23 Barangaroo Avenue, Barangaroo, NSW 2000 P 8077 3700

bookings@lovefish.com.au http://lovefish.com.au/

Hi Hana,

Thanks, this is very helpful.

I have checked and the PDF and can confirm this isn't something we created for you. Historically, Michelle has always emailed us the PDF's to be uploaded.

If you'd like us to assist with updating the PDF's, we can, we just need to get access the original design files.

Likewise, please let me know if you'd like any more info.

Hi Hana,

Melbourne Cup celebration at love.fish

Join love.fish as we celebrate our annual Cup Day lunch.

For $179pp, every guest will be greeted with a glass of Moët & Chandon Brut Impérial Champagne, followed by a delicious five course shared menu showcasing Australian produce.

The race will be live and loud on our in-house screen and our annual love.fish 'Fashions on the Field' will celebrate our most stylish guests, so be sure to come dressed to impress! Prizes and sweeps.

Book online here.

7/23 Barangaroo Avenue, Barangaroo, NSW 2000 P 8077 3700

bookings@lovefish.com.au http://lovefish.com.au/

Update sent to client. 

+15 mins Chris spent on interpretation of request.

Hi Michelle, 

Many thanks for the prompt call back. 

Confirming the requested updates have been completed on a draft page: https://www.lovefish.com.au/group-menu-draft/

Please review and let us know if there any further updates. Once approved, we'll transfer the changes to the live page.

1. create draft page - present changes to client 

2. Pricing updates on: https://www.lovefish.com.au/group-menu/
2 course 69> 85
3 course 75 > 89
3 course 85 > 99

3. All PDFs need to open in a new TAB.

4. Text on page show in screenshot to be updated from PDF 

5. "Nov + Dec" Section can be hidden/removed.

6. Section 3 - now becomes "alternate drop menu" with options to be copied from above. https://www.lovefish.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Alternate-Drop-Menu_Nov_Dec-01.pdf
(please keep consistent with above 2 sections)

Hi Michelle, 

We are making our way through the requested updates and would like clarification on the changes requested for: https://www.lovefish.com.au/group-menu/

I tried to call on the landline but was unable to get through. Can you please give me a call on 0421 859 547 when convenient?
